programme.title: Incredible Tales S8
programme.desc: Do ghosts really exist? Or are they nothing more than a figment of our imagination? Stay tuned to explore the thin line between reality and the supernatural.

programme.title: The Good Doctor S3
programme.desc: Doctors work against time and their own personal safety to save the lives of those around them.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent S14
programme.desc: Viewers can expect to be amazed by an incredible line-up of acts competing to be crowned this year's winner, from comedians and contortionists through to singers and dancers. Once again the judges will be saying yes to the acts that impress and buzzing off the acts that fail to make the mark, with the added excitement of the Golden Buzzer for the acts that have that extra-special something. Simon Cowell, Amanda Holden, Alicia Dixon and David Walliams will be returning to the judging panel.

programme.title: 72 Cutest Animals
programme.desc: Visually stunning and packed with scientific facts, this is a countdown and investigation into the cutest animals in the world. Animal lovers and experts assess each creature and rank them on a sliding scale to eventually uncover the cutest one in the world.

programme.title: Open Homes S2
programme.desc: We start with an Award winning kitchen, 3 levels, underground basement and a rumpus room packed with everything. At the Climax we see an incredible heritage renovation that shows the pay off to a challenging build.

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Dumplings and buns can be found everywhere in China, but why are gourmands so hung up about the piping-hot soup dumplings found in Shanghai? Just how many varieties are there? And what is the best way to eat soup dumplings? Find out more about the allure of this collagen-rich dish on Food Notes.

programme.title: Hotspots: The Last Hope
programme.desc: Our planet is abundant with life. But in some places where there is an especially large variety of animal and plant species, there is also a high level of habitat destruction. These are areas that demand special protection: the Hotspots of biodiversity. In recent years, three species are driven to extinction every day. Scientists have found a solution: we must preserve the Hotspots.

programme.title: Ellen's Game of Games S2
programme.desc: New season of the most popular and hilariously fun games from The Ellen DeGeneres Show.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is F. A fairy is lost and has accidentally found her way to the alphabet galaxy. Will the superheroes ever find her?

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus
programme.desc: The adventurers on-board the Rainbow Bus have chosen Jobs as the topic of the day! Together, they will learn about various jobs and Mister D will drive them to the Flight Simulation Centre where they will get to explore the cockpit and learn other aspects of flying. Afterwards Mr D will also bring them to a place where they can learn more about being a soldier; The Army Museum. Lastly, the adventurers are brought to a Jobs Playground.

programme.title: Zou S3
programme.desc: Join Zou the zebra and his family and friends for more daily adventures of discovery and exploration!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Captain Redbeard is going to a party and he wants to be the most fancy pirate there. Paula and her friends have to find things that come in pairs for Redbeard's make-over. Aamil is tasked with looking after Mr Merchant camel, but he gets distracted and the camel goes missing. Aamil gets help from Paula and her friends to find the missing camel. Will they succeed?

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: Cherry rescues a nest of baby birds. Poly-GON seizes the opportunity to infiltrate the Ollie Squad's home with his state-of-the-art, artificially intelligent Birdbot.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett and Jett Pet deliver special farmer's outfit to a girl named Greta who lives in Germany. Greta is very excited to make friends with every single animal on her grandfather's farm but when the animals escape their enclosure and get lost in the nearby forest, Jett will require Sunny's help to corral them all through song before they get into harm's way.

programme.title: The Deep S2
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: After hearing the story of King Arthur, our heroes decide to play at being knights of the round table, with Axel in the role of King. When Axel's sword gets stuck in a stone and he is unable to remove it, he begins to doubt if he really is the right person to lead the Power Players...

programme.title: Mind Blown!
programme.desc: Singapore has a reputation for being such a clean city. But is the sunny island hiding an ugly secret? Are we littering villains? Is Singapore a clean city or a cleaned city? Mind Blown! gets down and dirty to find out the truth.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S1
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers go on adventures where they end up tapping into mystic ninja powers.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Valt can't seem to get Wakiya out of his head. His friends try to remind him what Beyblade's all about, but can he rekindle his love of the game? Meanwhile, Shu gets some bad news but doesn't know how to break it to his friends.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: S7
programme.desc: The Great British Bake Off is the ultimate baking battle where passionate amateur baking competitors, young and old, from every background and every corner of Britain attempts to impress the judges through their baking prowess to be crowned the UK's Best Amateur Baker.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S20
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: The Champions
programme.desc: The premise is to round up the winners and/or most notable contestants from seasons 1-13 and have them face off head-to-head to see who is the ultimate America's Got Talent top act. America's Got Talent: The Champions will not just showcase the very best from the U.S. apparently. The show will pull top acts from global versions of the AGT franchise too.

programme.title: NINJAGO - Secrets Of The Forbidden Spinjitzu

programme.title: Power Rangers Beast Morphers S1
programme.desc: A new team of Power Rangers must defend the Morphin Grid from Evox, an evil sentient computer virus and his evil avatar clones!

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Planet
programme.desc: Bakugan Battle Planet follows the adventures of Dan and his best friends, the first kids on Earth to bond with the mysterious alien creatures known as Bakugan!

programme.title: TOBOT: Galaxy Detectives
programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Nightwatchers
programme.desc: The Night Watchers regain consciousness, only to find that everything in school has gone back to normal -- except for the fact that Ms. Lim and David have gone missing. While they try to track them both down, Jin finds a link between Ms. Lim and his late mother.

programme.desc: Despite Rody's effort to rescue the animal, the research trio succeeds to create a megabeast. The breath that megabeast exhales turns everything into dust, including trees that the environmental organization planted. The rest of the Animal Rescue team joins Rody in the battle against the megabeast. Will they be able to protect the desert forest?

programme.title: Animal Rescue

Animal Rescue Team quickly acts on them and takes down the BM robots. While they are fighting, a new megabeast appeared from the top of a frozen building.

Mama Ling starts a new food delivery service, but it doesn't go well and her rating drops. What will the children do to help Mama Ling improve her business?

programme.title: Tayo the Little Bus S4
programme.desc: Because Duri is so busy having fun during his summer break he doesn't have enough time to do any of his homework, so he asks Tayo for help. Tayo is too busy to help so he asks Rogi to help Duri. Rogi tries his best but ends up making a mess of everything. Duri is very disappointed. He tells Rogi that Tayo would have done a much better job. This inspires Rogi to work much harder and fix all the mistakes he made.

programme.title: Sesame Street S48

programme.title: Paw Patrol S7
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: An Egyptian sceptre has been stolen from the Ollipolis museum but the security footage shows the culprit looks a little like Triangle Man, the museum's security guard! Can the gang clear his name before he loses his beloved job? Bull Scooter wants to be a rodeo star! As he works towards fame and success, he doesn't notice all the ruckus he's caused on the streets. Can he undo the damages and pursue his dreams?

programme.desc: Continuing his journey in the bustling city of Hanoi, Luke is up bright-and-early to cook one of Vietnam's most famous dishes, pho bo (beef noodle soup with rice noodles). After perfecting this well known broth, he ventures to one of the outskirts of this amazing city to learn how rice paper is made, which he immediately applies to his spring roll recipe. In the greater parts of Hanoi, pork terrine and green rice are also on the menu.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: "play," "pause" and "fast forward" to living beings.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: Having learned the direction the Tychon was being taken on the day Sol was discovered on as a baby, the Novas take Sol on a mission to a planet inhabited entirely by mega-flora - then Sol goes missing.

Hot Shot, Whirl, Hoist, Medix and Wedge learn the value of teamwork, courage and friendship as they pass simulated and real rescue challenges. Under the guidance of Optimus Prime, Heatwave and Boulder they aim to one day be super heroes in their own right.

programme.title: Exlosers S4
programme.desc: Janice needs five hundred dollars to attend the special enrichment class, but Annie refuses to give her. Winston offers up instead. Catherine gives Daryl the five hundred in exchange for a favour. Leonard and Justin after attending the class, become like Ava and William. And they are able to exercise Exlosers powers.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, bad-ass stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. programme.title: 食分绝配
programme.desc: 涩味并不是一种味道，而是一种触觉，是口感的一种，而口感已经被证实可以改变大脑感知食物的味道与风味。当我们尝到涩味物质时，口腔和喉咙就会产生干燥、粗糙或起皱的感觉，所以涩，常常处于不受待见的地位，因为涩令人难以下咽。在这一集，杨应晖将尝试找出涩味最佳的搭档，挑战自己创作出一道颠覆大家对涩味认知的料理。.

programme.title: 香港原味道 （第四辑）
programme.desc: 《香港原味道》新四辑，谭玉瑛第四次领军，带着黄庭锋、孔德贤、林正峰继续追味寻源，从香港农田、鱼排，见证本地农业、渔业的发展。深入土炮食材的产地，寻找真正来自本港或香港制造的优质食材。每集深入认识一种地道食材，走进本土鱼场、鲜果园、鲜菜园、水耕菜工场、食品厂、酱油厂等等，发掘更多本地饮食智慧，品尝每一口新鲜美味，探索每一种港产食材背后的故事。.

programme.title: 那些年,我们一起玩的游戏

programme.title: 96oC咖啡
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 对立乔一直默默暗恋的唐雨晨，仍然不离不弃的守在立乔身边，她不忍心看着自己欣赏的立乔一阙不振，决心帮助立乔走出伤痛，重拾信心和欢笑。传之是96度C的常客，在雨晨眼里，他是个不事生产，沉迷上网的现代草莓一族，拥有严重的"王子病"，喝咖啡却没钱买单。为了还债，他只好接受雨晨的安排，留在96度Café 打工。传之来自富裕问题家庭，因为母亲意外卧病，父亲刘浩仁不甘寂寞与公司职员Ann发展了一段婚外畸恋, 传之为此与浩仁父子冲突离家出走。在96度C, 传之与雨晨相处的过程，发现自己爱上雨晨。他深知立乔封闭的心开始接受雨晨的感情，决定默默隐藏起感情，成全守候着雨晨。.

programme.title: 食在有价值
programme.desc: (重) 主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 暖心厨房
programme.desc: (重) 谢韵仪练习了一周的斋菜料理功夫就要派上用场，她会找哪位艺人朋友助她一臂之力，完成为乐龄人士们烹煮和递送午餐的终极任务呢？她和这位“厨艺了得而且热心公益”的超级助理会在时间很紧张的厨房里擦出什么火花？.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 世娜去见耕史，本来想勾引他，后来想到以前也因为勾引度英而害他丧命，才没有那样做。耕史看着哭泣的世娜，假装被感动，重新决定跟世娜合作。.

programme.title: 楼下女友请签收
programme.desc: (PG)(重)《楼下女友请签收》剧情讲述了为了赚钱维持家乡黄梅剧团的龙套演员温小暖被雇用扮演安宁文化CEO叶非墨的暗恋者之后，二人“假戏真做”成为真实爱侣的故事。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 南俊派人对付重基。重基连忙逃命，并在秀浩救援下保住一命。秀浩想带重基回朴家，但是重基不肯。两人车上起争执，导致车祸。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 珊荷来到朴家，揭发秀浩的真实身分。但朴会长一家人都无法相信她的说法。.

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲
programme.desc: (PG)(首播) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 43 岁的 马宝凤手忙脚乱，照顾着三个患有多动症的孩子和年迈的父母。她的父亲患有痴呆症，她的母亲患有关节炎。 翻新援助行动能否给这个家庭一个崭新、安全的家园，重新开始？.

programme.title: 爱的救援
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) DREAMS队的安迪选手被日本队看中，胜守经过考虑后要放安迪走，自己再重新选择一个合适的外援。世英与胜守在机场遇到了VIKINGS队的团长钟武，他试探胜守要去哪个国家找球员，却被胜守巧妙的避开了。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(首播) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏.

programme.desc: (重) 43 岁的 马宝凤手忙脚乱，照顾着三个患有多动症的孩子和年迈的父母。她的父亲患有痴呆症，她的母亲患有关节炎。 翻新援助行动能否给这个家庭一个崭新、安全的家园，重新开始？.

programme.title: 十大新加坡

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 正韩在一间乡下的房子找到了已经瘫痪的崔德培。泰洙向白哲承认崔德培在他手上。白哲担心泰洙会把崔德培交给正韩或警方，答应安静地等待泰洙的指令。.

Happening 10 years after the first season, Annasamy is retired now but can't sit idle,.

programme.desc: Irandu is a thriller dealing with familial ties and relationships at the fulcrum, against the backdrop of the twin sisters, Janani and Jhanvi. Janani is happily married to Navin for about two years. She succumbs to an emotional weakness which changes the course of her life. Jhanvi, the younger twin is an introverted woman who suffers from unresolved emotional issues and as a result of that, is unable to find the peace and happiness that she desperately wants.
